body.name: Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease Baby Formula, Brain Building DHA, HuMO6 Immune Blend, Designed to Reduce Fussiness, Crying, Gas & Spit-up in 24 Hrs, Gentle Infant Formula Powder, Baby Milk, 19.5 Oz Tub

features: 🍼ALL-IN-ONE COMFORT FOR YOUR LITTLE ONE: Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease is thoughtfully crafted to provide all-in-one comfort, designed to ease fussiness, crying, gas, and spit-up within just 24-hours, so you and your baby can enjoy precious moments of peace
🧠 NURTURING BRAIN DEVELOPMENT: Our formula has expert-recommended DHA, known to support your baby's growing brain, supporting their milestones with confidence
💧 HuMO6 GENTLE + IMMUNE BLEND§: Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease features our exclusive HuMO6 gentle + immune blend, to support your baby's immune system, because your baby's well-being is our top priority
🤱🏼 NUTRITION DESIGNED FOR YOUR INFANT: Designed with care for babies up to 12 months, Enfamil formula includes easy-to-digest proteins, vitamins & minerals
👨🏽‍⚕️ TRUSTED BY PARENTS & PEDIATRICIANS*: Enfamil is the #1 Trusted Infant Formula Brand by Pediatricians* & Parents and the #1 Trusted Brand for Brain-Building & Immune Support
SNAP ELIGIBLE: Eligible to be purchased with Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits
SUBSCRIBE & SAVE: Choose Subscribe and Save for additional savings and convenience
body.description: Introducing Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease. Our trusted Gentlease baby formula, clinically proven to reduce fussiness, colic, baby gas, and crying within 24 hours, now has MFGM that provides brain support first. Emerging evidence from a recent clinical study showed MFGM in baby formula supports cognitive development similar to breast milk. NeuroPro is the only infant formula that has a fat-protein blend of MFGM & Omega 3 DHA, previously only found in breast milk. So you can get nutrition for brain support inspired by breast milk from the baby formula brand that's No.1 recommended by Pediatricians. It offers Complete nutrition for babies through 12 months with Omega 3 DHA and Choline, important nutrients for brain support, easy-to-digest proteins, and baby probiotics for immune support. As measured by Bayley-III cognitive score at 12 months in a different formula with MFGM added as an ingredient. QuintilesIMS, using the ProVoice Survey fielded from Janurary 2017 to December 31, 2017. In amounts supported by clinical research. Not made with genetically modified ingredients, but trace amounts of genetically engineered materials may be present in the product from manufacturing environments and process sources. Ingredients: Corn Syrup Solids, Vegetable Oil (Palm Olein, Coconut, Soy, and High Oleic Sunflower Oils), Partially Hydrolyzed Nonfat Milk and Whey Protein Concentrate Solids (Soy), Whey Protein Lipid Concentrate (Milk), and Less than 2% Morterella Alpina Oils, Schizochytrium SP. Oil“, Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Citrate, Calcium Phosphate, Potassium Chloride, Magnesium Phosphate Ferrous Sulfate, Zinc Sulfate, Cupric Sulfate, Manganese Sulfate, Potassium Iodide, Sodium Selenite, Choline Chloride, Inositol, Ascorbic Acid, Niacinamide, Calcium Pantothenate, Riboflavin, Thiamin Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B6 Hydrochloride, Folic Acid, Vitamin K1, Biotin, Vitamin B12, Vitamin E Acetate, Vitamin A Palmitate, Taurine, L-Carnitine. A source of MFGM (milk fat globule membrane). A source of Arachidonic Acid (ARA). “A source of Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequently Asked Questions What is HuMO6? Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease has an exclusive blend of ingredients to support your baby's immune health, such as 2'-FL HMO, Vitamin C & E, Selenium, partially hydrolyzed protein, and reduced lactose. What is 2'-FL HMO? 2'-FL HMO stands for 2'-Fucosyllactose, which is a special kind of sugar also found in human breast milk. They're like a special treat for the good bacteria in a baby's tummy. They help the good bacteria grow and help keep the baby's tummy healthy. It supports the baby's immune system and digestion! Why is DHA so important? Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease has expert-recommended omega-3 DHA to support baby's brain & eye development. What is MFGM? MFGM, short for milk fat globule membrane, is a natural component found in every drop of breast milk. Why is MFGM so important? MFGM is packed with an array of components. MFGM in infant formula is clinically shown to support brain development from now to age 5. This is an important time for your baby's brain development. Their little minds create a million new neural connections. These connections lay the groundwork for their future.

Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease Enfamil NeuroPro Infant Enfamil Enspire Optimum Nutramigen Key Benefit Relief from Fussiness, Crying, Gas & Spit-Up and has Brain Building DHA & MFGM** Components, HuMO6* Gentle Immune Blend Brain Building DHA & MFGM** Components, HuMO6* Immune Blend Our Closest Formula to Breast Milk and Brain Building DHA, HuMO6* Premium Immune Blend For Relief from Cow's Milk Allergy and has Brain Building DHA MFGM Components* ✓ ✓ ✓ Brain Building DHA ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ HuMO6 Immune Blend *2'-FL HMO, Vitamin C & E, Selenium, partially hydrolyzed protein, and reduced lactose *2'-FL HMO, PDX, GOS, Vit C & E and Selenium *2'-FL & LNnT HMO, Vit C & E, Selenium, Zinc For Fussiness, Crying, Gas & Spit-Up ✓ For Cow's Milk Allergy ✓ Our Closest to Breast Milk ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From a mom with a baby who was fussy from tummy aches- Thankful for Gentlease Neuropro
reviews.reviewText: After feeling bummed that I was not producing breast milk and now a fussy baby. Gentlease Neuropro was easy on the tummy and provided all the nutrients my baby needs with the neuropro to help with brain development. I could feel at ease myself that my baby was getting a good formula without being to harsh on her tummy- As all moms want the best for their baby, this formula is the best and is so convenient to order thru amazon when the stores are so unpredictable when it comes to what formulas are available (mostly out of stock when we needed)- Great formula delivered at my doorstep- Couldn't be happier! P.S. AMAZON takes Snap EBT!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I am recently trying to find the perfect formula for my baby and so far this has been the best one. It goes down smoothly for her does not look thick in the bottle and is smooth. Would definitely recommend for anyone who is trying to find the right formula for their baby. However, each baby is different.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easier to find
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 3 or 4 times already and it has been a life saver for me, I have twins so bringing them to the store and having to haul multiple jugs of this formula would suck including their gallon waters. Also I cannot seem to find this specific size for this formula anywhere else I live and I find it better to buy this bulk than to buy the jugs. My twins last at least 2 weeks with 4 of the 35 oz boxes, so this is definitely convenient for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby isn't as fussy
reviews.reviewText: With the gentlease formula, my baby isn't as fussy as he was when I was using the regular one. Delivery was excellent and done very promptly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this formula, and Amazon’s price even had Walmart beat (at the time I bought it)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used for our daughter her entire 1st year. Referred to us by her pediatrician. Cheapest place to order was Sam's Club. Would order off Amazon if needed in a pinch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product at great price
reviews.reviewText: Have this set up to auto deliver is great and easy so I don’t have to constantly worry about picking up formula and the price is great.
